abstract: General Electric has reached a tentative agreement to buy Vivendi’s 20 percent stake in NBC Universal for about $5.8 billion, helping clear the path to a sale of the television and movie company to Comcast, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: General Electric has reached a tentative agreement to buy Vivendi’s 20 percent stake in NBC Universal for about $5.8 billion, helping clear the path to a sale of the television and movie company to Comcast, according to people briefed on the matte...
lead_paragraph: Update | 9:17 p.m. General Electric has reached a tentative agreement to buy Vivendi‘s 20 percent stake in NBC Universal for about $5.8 billion, helping clear the path to a sale of the television and movie company to Comcast, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: G.E. Pact With Vivendi Clears Way for Sale of NBC

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Bill Carter

abstract: General Electric reached a tentative agreement to buy Vivendi’s stake in NBC for about $5.8 billion.
snippet: General Electric reached a tentative agreement to buy Vivendi’s stake in NBC for about $5.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has reached a tentative agreement with the French media conglomerate Vivendi that clears the way for the sale of NBC Universal, including the flagship NBC network, to Comcast, the nation’s largest cable operator, people briefed on the deal said Monday.

headline.main: With Deal, G.E. Clears Path to Sale of NBC
headline.print_headline: With Deal, G.E. Clears Path to Sale of NBC

byline.original: By Tim Arango and Bill Carter

abstract: General Electric has reached a tentative agreement with the French media conglomerate Vivendi that clears the way for the sale of NBC Universal, including the flagship NBC network, to Comcast, the nation’s largest cable operator, people briefed on the deal said.
snippet: General Electric has reached a tentative agreement with the French media conglomerate Vivendi that clears the way for the sale of NBC Universal, including the flagship NBC network, to Comcast, the nation’s largest cable operator, people briefed on...
lead_paragraph: General Electric has reached a tentative agreement with the French media conglomerate Vivendi that clears the way for the sale of NBC Universal, including the flagship NBC network, to Comcast, the largest U.S. cable operator, people briefed on the deal said on Monday.

headline.main: With Deal, G.E. Clears Path to Sale of NBC

abstract: By selling its stake in NBC Universal, Vivendi will be able to shed the last remaining piece of the acquisitive legacy of its former chief executive and use the proceeds to search for growth in emerging economies, analysts said Tuesday.
snippet: By selling its stake in NBC Universal, Vivendi will be able to shed the last remaining piece of the acquisitive legacy of its former chief executive and use the proceeds to search for growth in emerging economies, analysts said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: By selling its stake in NBC Universal, Vivendi will shed one of the most important pieces of the acquisitive legacy of its former chief executive and use the proceeds to search for growth in emerging economies, The New York Times’s Chris V. Nicholson reports from Paris.

headline.main: With Deal for NBC, Vivendi Sheds Its Past
